name: The ChokeHold
description: This game is all about the secrets of the old house you just moved into. But something is off with this house. Lights turning off all by themselfs when the power bill is payed you find something in the basement while trying to do your chores. A false wall, you push it open and you see it. Bodies with goat heads, and a demonic circle you run out of the room to go tell your mom but shes nowhere to be found. You find a note on the fridge, "Hey honey, i'm gonna be out for 3 days because of my job, I packed some food in the fridge, I swear were gonna go on vacation on the weekend, love you honey". "what...no"
